entity.description: Conversation about the Supreme Court and justices

text:
@realDonaldTrump Why does Manafort get out of jail because of the #coronavirus, but our  #Wisconsin Supreme Court does not value our lives enough to follow your guidelines for reopening? I've asked President Obama this question too. This makes no sense, but nothing in 3 1/2 years makes sense.
Wow
